Phenomenology of Perception is published; Merleau-Ponty is awarded doctorate; co-founds, with Sartre and de Beauvoir, the journal Les Temps modernes
Appointed junior faculty (maître de conférences) and promoted to Professor of Philosophy at the University of Lyon
Professor of Child Psychology and Pedagogy at the Sorbonne University
Elected to Chair of Philosophy at the Collège de France
